<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Nyarlathotep (Haunter in the Dark)](/Deities.aspx?ID=222)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 122</row>

Nyarlathotep is often venerated by [grioth](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=240)s in a bat-like incarnation with a three-lobed burning eye known as the Haunter in the Dark. His symbol is a circle with wing-shaped arms.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Outer Gods and Great Old Ones
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=13)

**Edicts** Create darkness, encourage authorities to bring the apocalypse 

**Anathema** none

**Follower Alignments**
NE, CE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

**Favored Weapon** [Kukri](/Weapons.aspx?ID=56)

**Domains** [Darkness](/Domains.aspx?ID=6), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=17), [Nightmares](/Domains.aspx?ID=23), [Trickery](/Domains.aspx?ID=31)
